data.prayer: Father, knowing that teachers will be judged more strictly, help the local leaders in Rewari, Haryana, India to be careful with their words.
data.verse: Not many of you should become teachers, my brothers, for you know that we who teach will be judged with greater strictness.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Rewari, Haryana, India
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the county of Rewari, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 90 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, help the 9,903 believers in Rewari to know that you can make a big impact through their simple obedience today.
data.verse: you will be for me a kingdom of priests

data.prayer: Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 9,903 believers in Rewari, Haryana, India a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Brahmin Sankliwal people might believe through him.
Lord, please make the same Spirit that raised Jesus from the dead give life to those who are called by his name in the county of Rewari.
data.verse: But if the Spirit of him who raised up Jesus from the dead dwells in you, he who raised up Christ Jesus from the dead will also give life to your mortal bodies through his Spirit who dwells in you.

data.prayer: Spirit, sanctify the 9,903 believers in Rewari and keep them blameless until Jesus returns.
data.verse: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.

data.prayer: Father, please remove the barriers that keep the 879,473 who are far from you in Rewari, Haryana, India from having access to a Bible.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.
